name: Chinese Souls-Hua Garden/中华之魂-华园
detailed_description:
In this beautiful Hua Garden player will be able to develop character skills and experience chinese culture through different games and NPC interactions.There are more than 10 different types of games to test player's skill limit.Chinese food,music,go,even Chinese KongFu and so much more are awaiting for you to discover its excitment.At the same time,enjoy the vivid story line by completing various quests.
English Version will be released early August!
about_the_game:
In this beautiful Hua Garden player will be able to develop character skills and experience chinese culture through different games and NPC interactions.There are more than 10 different types of games to test player's skill limit.Chinese food,music,go,even Chinese KongFu and so much more are awaiting for you to discover its excitment.At the same time,enjoy the vivid story line by completing various quests.
English Version will be released early August!
short_description: In this beautiful Hua Garden player will be able to develop character skills and experience chinese culture through different games and NPC interactions.There are more than 10 different types of games to test player's skill limit.Chinese food,music,go,even Chinese KongFu and much more
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8.1 or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-3770 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 or AMD GPU Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
